Objects.Name: wicked trident
Objects.Description: A wicked looking trident is stuck into the ground here.
Objects.ExtraFlags: Glow, NoInvis, Magic, MagicUser, Cleric, NoSell

Objects.Name: black leather whip
Objects.Description: A black leather whip lies on the ground here.

Objects.Name: hickey maker
Objects.Description: A hickey maker lies on the ground here making a soft sucking sound.

Objects.Name: farslayer sword
Objects.Description: A black hilted sword with engravings on the blade lies here.
Objects.ExtraFlags: NoDonate, NoInvis, Magic, NoDrop, AntiGood, MagicUser, Cleric, Thief, NoSell
Objects.ExtraDescription: The blade of the sword is a full meter long, and straight as an arrow, withlightly fluted sides.  Both edges keened down to perfect lines, invisibly sharp.Perfection like this could of only been forged by a god.  The black hilt iscontrasted only by the faint symbol of a white arrow.  Upon the blade isengraved a poem:                      Farslayer howls across the world                      For thy heart, for thy heart, who hast wronged me!                      Vengeance is his who casts the blade                      Yet he will in the end no triumph see.
